1370: Gisekin moved to Die Camp.D.7 after marriage.
Got married to Ymmekine at age 19 in 1370.
1372: Had a son with Ymmekine, Gisekin, at age 21.
1373: Had a daughter with Ymmekine, Goneir, at age 22.
1374: Had a son with Ymmekine, Hornekinga, at age 23.
1375: Had a daughter with Ymmekine, Hadewigis, at age 24.
1378: Lost his wife Ymmekine while she was giving birth to Harderico in 1378.
Became caretaker of Gisekin, Goneir, Hornekinga, Hadewigis, Harderico at age 28.
